Name: Hidden Ghost Town 2
About the game: Find the objects that are hidden on the map. The game is a Hidden Object Game. In which you need to find objects with a certain design in beautiful locations, and click on them with the mouse. The game is a 2D level pixel game in which objects and characters are frozen in the picture, you have to find 20 different objects. The system automatically determines which object you need to find at the moment, so the game has a high replay value, you will need to search for different objects each time.
